messages.content: Give me and my candidate your vote on Thursday 8th June and I will: Provide strong and stable leadership for our country. Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future. Always stand up for you and your family. Don’t risk our future at this crucial moment in history with a vote for anyone else. Back me on Thursday 8th June to lead Britain.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Fair Deal for Cambridge, the Country & Europe
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will ensure we secure a flexible as well as controlled immigration policy.
I will champion Cambridge's strengths, as I have through my career around the world.
I will work closely with the new Mayor of Cambridgeshire & Peterborough to deliver the Metro Plan.
